credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Embroidered picture
medium:
Medium: silk and metal on linen
Technique: tent, stem, split, and knots, couching, padded couching and padded interlacing; counted and uncounted stitches
description: Two inch border containing floral and animal motifs (birds, rose, thistle, honeysuckle, heart's-ease, carnation, grapes) with a rockery at each corner with lions, deer, and dragons.  In the center is a deer at the foot of a pear tree; the scene at the left shows Adam and Eve in the act of eating the apple; the one at the right has the angel saving Abraham from slaying Isaac.
name: Embroidered picture
